BrowserActionTitle.description: Title for the browser action that's visible to the user of extension

Close.description: The string that shows up on a button used to close a window.

EDAMError_1.description: Used to describe an unknown EDAM error

EDAMError_3.description: Indicates that permission was denied for request by the server

EDAMError_3_User_active.description: Indicates that a user tried to login but their account is inactive
EDAMError_3_User_active.message: Permissão negada porque o utilizador está inactivo

EDAMError_3_User_tooManyFailuresTryAgain.description: Indicates that a user tried to login way too many times with invalid credentials and needs to chill for a bit
EDAMError_3_User_tooManyFailuresTryAgain.message: Demasiadas tentativas de login falhadas. Por favor, tente novamente mais tarde.

Error_HTTP_Transport.description: Generic error indicating that the extension could not get a response from a server
Error_HTTP_Transport.message: Problemas na comunicação com o servidor [$status$]. $errorText$

Error_Network_Unavailable.description: error message shown when we can't connect to the internet.

ExtensionDescription.description: Description of the extension as it's visible to the outside world
ExtensionDescription.message: Use a extensão do Evernote para guardar as coisas que você vê na web na sua conta do Evernote.

ExtensionName.description: Name of the extension as it's visible to the outside world

addAMessage.description: placeholder text for the message field of the email sharing dialog

addDate.description: button to add date to reminder

addReminder.description: string in smart email extension to instruct user to add a reminder if there isn't one set already

addTags.description: label in options page to describe the keyboard shortcut that opens the filing dialog with a focus on the tags field

addTask.description: string in smart email extension to instruct user to add a task

afterClip.description: option in options page for what to show after a successful clip

allFieldsRequired.description: error message for feedback form if user doesn't fill out all the fields

alwaysTagWith.description: label for always tag with option in options page

annotate.description: header for the skitch section of the sidebar

apply.description: label for button to apply crop in skitch mode

approved.description: default label for the green checkmark skitch stamp

arrow.description: label for shortcut to use the skitch arrow tool in options page

articleClipFailure.description: Messages shown to user when the article of the page isn't clippable.
articleClipFailure.message: O Evernote não pode capturar esta página como um artigo. Seleccione a parte que deseja capturar.

authExpired.description: Error message if user tries to clip with an expired or revoked auth token.
authExpired.message: O acesso a esta aplicação foi revogado através do serviço web do Evernote. Por favor, volte a introduzir a sua palavra-passe.

authPersistenceError.description: Error indicating that the browser fails to persist authentication.
authPersistenceError.message: As preferências do seu browser estão em conflito com a extensão Evernote. Tente restaurar as definições de privacidade do conteúdo para os valores predefinidos: Permita que sejam definidos dados locais e NÃO bloqueie os cookies de terceiros. Considere desactivar outras extensões de terceiros.

autocloseClipper.description: option in options page. if enabled, it shows the partial post clip dialog that disappears after three seconds

businessNotebook.description: tooltip for business notebooks in notebook selector

cannotSaveClip.message: Não é possível guardar esta captura

captcha_instruction.description: Instruction for captcha in the registration form.

checkVersionWarning.description: Warning message shown to user when the client doesn't pass version check
checkVersionWarning.message: Esta versão do Evernote Web Clipper já não é compatível com o Serviço Evernote. Por favor instale a última versão disponível.

clearFeatureDiscoveryTooltip.description: The message that pops up when you hover over the 'x' icon for the 'feature discovery' box.

clearTagsToolTip.description: The message that pops up when you hover over the 'x' icon that displays beside the tag list.

clearly.description: label for shortcut to go to clearly mode

clipShortcuts.description: header of the clip shortcuts on options page

clipsFromThisSite.description: Label for the site search button.

closeWebClipper.description: label for shortcut to close clipper
closeWebClipper.message: Fechar o Web Clipper ou o painel activo

contentclipper_clipping.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being scraped for clipping.

contentclipper_clipping_no_title.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being scraped for clipping when the title of the clip is unavailable.

contentclipper_clipping_short.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being scraped for clipping.

contentclipper_syncing.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being sent to the server.

contentclipper_syncing_short.description: Message shown on content pages to notify users that the page is being sent to the server.

contextMenuClipImage.description: Context menu item for creating a new note with image

contextMenuClipPDF.description: Context menu item for creating a new note with PDF

contextMenuClipPage.description: Context menu item for clipping current page

contextMenuClipScreenshot.description: Context menu item for creating a skitch clip

contextMenuClipSelection.description: Context menu item for clipping current selection

contextMenuClipUrl.description: Context menu item for creating a new note with just the URL of the current page

contextMenuPleaseLogin.description: Help message shown to users when they try to clip content via contextual menu items but not being intially logged in
contextMenuPleaseLogin.message: Tem de iniciar sessão utilizando o botão da barra de ferramentas Capturar para o Evernote antes de poder fazer uma captura

contractArticle.description: label for shortcut to contract article selection

contractArticleTooltip.description: tooltip for button to contract the article preview box

copyToClipboard.description: button in sharing dialog to copy the share url to the clipboard

copyright.message:
Copyright 2009-2014 Evernote Corporation. Todos os direitos reservados.
Política de Privacidade | Termos de Serviço

corpBusinessNotes.description: header of dialog that tells business user that he needs to complete SSO to see his business's content

cyclePreviews.description: label for shortcut to cycle through sidebar preview options
cyclePreviews.message: Percorrer através da vista da barra lateral um passo de cada vez

deleting.description: Message indicating that the extension is deleting previously clipped note from the server

desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInM.description: Message shown to users inside desktop notification informing users that they clip could not be uploaded because they are not authenticated...
desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInM.message: Autenticação inválida ou expirada. Por favor inicie sessão clicando no botão da barra de ferramentas e tente novamente.

desktopNotification_clipProcessorSignInT.description: Title for desktop notification informing user that there was an error with uploading a clip. This should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_clipProcessorTooMany.description: Message indicating that we've tried too many times to clip this note.
desktopNotification_clipProcessorTooMany.message: A captura "$title$" falhou demasiadas vezes e não é possível tentar novamente.

desktopNotification_clipUploaded.description: Headline for desktop notification indicating that clip was successfully uploaded into a notebook

desktopNotification_retryFailedClip.description: Name of the action associated with retrying the clip that failed to upload. Should be as short as possible

desktopNotification_unableToSaveClip.description: Headline for desktop notifications indicating there was a problem with saving the clip

desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.description: Headline for desktop notification indicating that there was an unknown error while uploading a clip
desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.message: Não é possível guardar a captura

desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.description: Description of the unknown error that may occur after the extension failed to upload a clip
desktopNotification_unableToSaveClipUnkn.message: Ocorreu um erro desconhecido ao tentar guardar uma das suas capturas. Mensagem de Erro: $details$

dismiss.description: Message shown on buttons to dismiss a widget of some kind

dismissTip.description: button to dismiss a cross promotion (i.e. tip) in the post-clip dialog

dontShowAgain.description: button on promotions that hides the promo forever if the user clicks on it

ellipse.description: label for shortcut to use the ellipse tool in options page

email.description: Label for email field of registration form

emailClip.description: label for option in global toolbar

emailLimitError.description: error message if user exceeds daily email limit
emailLimitError.message: Você não poderá enviar mais do que $limit$ e-mails por dia

subject.example: Abe continues to be steadying force for Giants

enableKeyboardShortcuts.description: checkbox in options page to enable keyboard shortcuts

enterCode.description: instruction on two step pages to enter the verification or backup code

enterEmailAddresses.description: placeholder text for the recipient field of the email sharing dialog

errorLogs.description: label for error logs in options page

expandArticle.description: label for shortcut to expand article selection

expandArticleTooltip.description: tooltip for button to expand the article preview box

expiredTwoStepCode.description: error for expired two step verification code
expiredTwoStepCode.message: A sua sessão expirou. Por favor, tente novamente.

expiredV1Password.description: error message for when user with a V1 password tries to login. only used for non-english
expiredV1Password.message: É necessária uma actualização da palavra-passe.

feedbackRequired.description: placeholder text for the feedback field in the feedback form

filing.description: Message indicating that the extension is filing changes made to previously clipped note on the server

findANotebook.description: placeholder text for notebook search box

fleButtonFinish.description: Button to go to the last first-time user screen

fleButtonNext.description: Button to go to the next first-time user screen

fleConclusionSubheader.message: Espalhe pelo mundo! Fale à sua família, amigos e colegas acerca do novo Web Clipper.

fleFakeNotebook.description: Fake notebook for the first time user

fleFakeUser.description: Fake name for the first time user

fleMarkUpBody.description: First-time user mark up screen, body
fleMarkUpBody.message: Faça capturas de ecrã através de um único clique.

fleMarkUpCTA.description: First-time user mark up screen, CTA
fleMarkUpCTA.message: Clique em Captura de Ecrã na barra lateral.

fleMarkUpHeader.description: First-time user mark up screen, header

fleMarkUpToolsBody.description: First-time user mark up tools screen, body
fleMarkUpToolsBody.message: Utilize as ferramentas de marcação e comunique de forma rápida e clara algo para si mesmo, ou com colegas e amigos. Utilize as setas, o realçador e o marcador para se focar no texto mais importante.

fleMarkUpToolsBody2.description: second part of the mark up tools screen in the first launch experience
fleMarkUpToolsBody2.message:
A ferramenta carimbo oferece um sistema simples para facilmente poder aprovar, rejeitar ou realçar o seu conteúdo favorito.
Esconda informações confidenciais com a ferramenta de Pixealização. Chame a atenção para qualquer coisa.

fleMarkUpToolsCTA.description: First-time user mark up tools demo screen, CTA
fleMarkUpToolsCTA.message: Agora, vamos marcar a sua captura de ecrã

fleMarkUpToolsHeader.description: First-time user mark up tools screen, header

fleShareBody.message: Partilhar as suas capturas da web não podia ser mais simples.

fleShareCTA.message: Clique no botão Partilhar existente na barra lateral e dê-lhe uma tentativa.

fleShareDialogBody.message: Depois de seleccionar o formato para a captura da web (artigo simplificado, artigo marcado, etc), você poderá partilhá-lo de três formas: Numa mensagem nas redes sociais, incluindo Facebook, Twitter e LinkedIn, colar o link numa captura da web, ou enviando-o por e-mail.

fleSharedTitle.description: Title of the url to be shared on social networks

fleWelcomeBody1.message: O novo Web Clipper permite que você corte, marque, faça capturas de ecrã, etiquete e guarde o conteúdo que você encontrar online, bem como os partilhe fácil e selectivamente com os seus amigos.

fleWelcomeBody2.message: Para uma experiência de leitura online mais limpa ou na sua conta Evernote, utilize a vista de Artigo Simplificado para remover as distracções desnecessárias da página.

fleWelcomeCTA.message: Clique em Artigo Simplificado para o ver e em seguida, guardar na sua conta do Evernote, se assim o desejar.

fleWelcomeSubheader.message: Capture e Marque Artigos da Web

foodTip.message: Descubra grandes receitas e óptimos restaurantes, e preserve as suas experiências alimentares memoráveis ​​com a aplicação móvel Food do Evernote.

forgotPassword.description: label for password recovery link on the login screen

from.description: label for sender in email sharing dialog

fullPageClip.description: Tooltip for full page clip tool

fullPageClipFailure.description: Message shown to user when full page clip wasn't possible
fullPageClipFailure.message: O Evernote não consegue capturar esta página inteira. Por favor, seleccione a parte da página que deseja capturar.

gaMessage.description: Message shown on the Google Authenticator Two Step page
gaMessage.message: Introduza o código de verificação exibido na sua aplicação Google Authenticator.

getMoreSpacePremium.description: error if premium user exceeds quota

globalShortcuts.description: header of the global shortcuts on options page

gmailError.description: notification to user that a thread needs to be open to clip it
gmailError.message: Você necessita de ter uma conversa seleccionada para poder fazer uma captura a partir do Gmail.

gmailTooltip.message: Agora você pode unir os tópicos de e-mail do Gmail directamente com a sua conta do Evernote.

hideRelatedNotes.description: text for the link in the 'related notes' overlay that will hide this section.

highlighter.description: label for shortcut to use the highlighter tool in options page

ignore.description: button in SSO dialog that user uses to avoid completing SSO at the moment

illegalUrlClipFailure.description: Error message shown when you try to clip from pages that aren't scriptable by the browser. Such as the chrome gallery pages.
illegalUrlClipFailure.message: Devido às restrições definidas pelo seu browser, não pode capturar esta página.

inactiveNudgeBody.description: body for the popup that appears when the user hasn't used the clipper in 25 days
inactiveNudgeBody.message: Seleccione qualquer conteúdo de uma página web e, em seguida, clique no botão Web Clipper na barra de ferramentas para o guardar.

inactiveNudgeHeader.description: heading for the popup that appears when the user hasn't used the clipper in 25 days
inactiveNudgeHeader.message: Capture coisas importantes com o Evernote Web Clipper

includeAttachment.description: checkbox in smart email extension if user wants to include email attachments in the note

includeOriginalEmail.description: checkbox in smart email extension if user wants to include original email in the note

incorrectCode.description: error for incorrect two-step verification code
incorrectCode.message: O código que você introduziu está incorreto.

keyboardShortcuts.description: label for keyboard shortcuts section in the options page

lastUsedAction.description: label for last used action option in options page

lastUsedNotebook.description: label for using last used notebook in notebook selection on options page

legal.description: label for legal notices in the options page

legalNoticesTitle.description: the title of the legal notices dialog in the options page where we list the licenses of all third party packages we use
legalNoticesTitle.message: O Web Clipper usa o seguinte software de código-fonte aberto

line.description: label for shortcut to use the line tool in options page

loading.description: Message shown when extension is loading...

loggingIn.description: Message indicating that the extension is currently attempting to sign in user

loginForm_login.description: Sign in button label for login form

loginForm_password.description: Label for entering password into login form

loginForm_searchHelper.description: Label for search helper option on the login view
loginForm_searchHelper.message: Mostrar Resultados Relacionados ao pesquisar na web

loginForm_username.description: Label for entering email address or username into login form

loginForm_usernameError_5.message: É obrigatório um nome de utilizador.

loginForm_usernameError_8.message: O nome de utilizador e a palavra-passe não correspondem a nenhum utilizador existente.

loginForm_usernameInvalidChinaError.message: Registo desconhecido ou tente através do Evernote Internacional

loginForm_usernameInvalidError.message: Não existe nenhum utilizador com esse nome.

login_searchHelperLongDescription.description: Description of the search-helper feature as shown on the options page
login_searchHelperLongDescription.message: Quando activo, as suas pesquisas nos motores de busca suportados também serão realizadas na sua conta do Evernote.

logs_export.description: Title of the button for exporting all of the logs

logs_follow.description: Label for an option to trail the logfile

logs_selectLogFile.description: Label for selecting log files for viewing

logs_title.description: The title of the logs page.

marker.description: label for shortcut to use the marker tool in options page

markupShortcuts.description: header of the markup shortcuts on options page

message.description: label for message in the email sharing dialog

more.description: General purpose, capitalized word for More - as in - there's more to see/read etc.

morePagesFound.description: popup in article mode to indicate that the article has more than one additional page

moveArticleDownShortcut.description: label for keyboard shortcut that moves the article preview box down the page
moveArticleDownShortcut.message: Mover para baixo a selecção de artigos

moveArticleUpShortcut.description: label for keyboard shortcut that moves the article preview box up the page
moveArticleUpShortcut.message: Mover para cima a selecção de artigos

nearQuota.message: Está próximo do seu limite de uploads

nearQuotaFree.description: message for free users after clipping something that puts them over 75% of quota
nearQuotaFree.message: Você tem apenas 25% restantes. Faça o upgrade para o modo Premium e obtenha 1GB de uploads mensais, notas com um tamanho de 100MB e muito mais.

nearQuotaPremium.description: message for premium users after clipping something that puts them over 75% of quota
nearQuotaPremium.message: Você tem apenas 25% restantes. Obtenha uma capacidade adicional de 1GB de uploads mensais.

newFeatureDescription.description: The popover description of for the Smart Filing feature, including a link to the options page.
newFeatureDescription.message: O Web Clipper fornecerá sugestões de etiquetas e blocos de notas com base no conteúdo capturado. Administre esse recurso e outras definições nas Opções do Web Clipper.

newFeatureTitle.description: The title for any new feature we're showcasing in the current release.

nextWeek.description: button to set reminder for one week from now

noResult.description: text in post clip dialog when there are no related notes or clips from that domain

noThanks.description: label for button in the ratings prompt to not rate or send feedback

notNow.description: button to dismiss near quota warning

noteSizeExceededFree.description: Error message shown to free users who try to clip something over the maximum note size
noteSizeExceededFree.message: Você necessita do modo Premium do Evernote para poder guardar capturas com um tamanho superior a 25MB.

noteSizeExceededPremium.description: Error message shown to premium users who try to clip something over the maximum note size
noteSizeExceededPremium.message: Você não pode guardar capturas superiores a 100MB.

notebookSelection.description: label for notebook selection in options page

notification_quotaExceededFree.description: Indicates that free user has exceeded their quota
notification_quotaExceededFree.message: Você está sem espaço. Faça o upgrade para o modo Premium e obtenha 1GB de uploads mensais, notas com um tamanho de100MB e muito mais.

notification_quotaExceededPremium.description: Indicates that premium user has exceeded their quota
notification_quotaExceededPremium.message: Você está sem espaço. Obtenha uma capacidade mensal adicional de 1GB.

notifyMe.description: label for dialog that adds/updates a date to a reminder

oneMorePageFound.description: popup in article mode to indicate that the article has one additional page

openConvoInGmail.description: button in gmail clips that has a link back to the original Gmail thread

openInEvernote.description: view/edit link in the post-clip notification

options_buildId.description: The revison number of this build of the clipper, as pulled fro mSVN at the time the clipper was built.

options_client.description: Label for the dropdown menu in Options where user can choose what client s/he wants to open and edit notes in

options_clientSelectionDescription.description: Description of the dropdown menu to select what client the user wants to open notes in. Only displayed when user selects the desktop client
options_clientSelectionDescription.message: No primeiro uso desta definição, uma caixa de diálogo 'Solicitação de Protocolo Externo' será exibida. Para obter a melhor experiência, marque a caixa de selecção 'Lembrar minha escolha' e, em seguida, 'Iniciar Aplicação'.

options_client_desktop.description: Desktop client choice in the dropdown menu to select what client to open/edit a note in

options_client_web.description: Web client choice in the dropdown menu to select what client to open/edit a note in

options_clipAction.description: Label for specifying default clipping action

options_clipAction_article.description: Label for article as the default clipping action

options_clipAction_fullPage.description: Label for full-page as the default clipping action

options_clipAction_url.description: Label for url as the default clipping action

options_clipNotificationEnabled.description: Label for option to enable notification about successful clips

options_clipNotificationEnabledDescripti.message: Quando esta opção estiver activa, será notificado do envio de uma captura. As notificações tornam mais fácil mostrar, editar e partilhar as suas capturas.

options_clipStyle.description: Label for the option to keep the style of the page while clipping.

options_clipStyleDescription.description: Description for the option to preserve styles with clips.
options_clipStyleDescription.message: Quando esta opção estiver activa, as capturas preservarão as informações de estilo para reflectir da forma mais exacta possível a página original. Quando desactivada, elas receberão um estilo simples com texto plano e nenhuma decoração.

options_eventLogDescription.description: Describes the purpose of the event logs link in the options page.
options_eventLogDescription.message: O Histórico de Actividades contém uma lista detalhada dos passos que a aplicação Evernote executa, bem como informações sobre a sua conta, sobre o seu dispositivo e informações de localização (se activado). Os títulos das suas Notas, etiquetas, nomes de Blocos de Notas e, ocasionalmente, o conteúdo das Notas também podem ser incluídos. Nós tratamos os seus dados do Histórico de Actividades como confidenciais, e os termos de nossa Política de Privacidade são aplicados.

options_eventLogLink.description: the text for the link to the event logs page from the options page

options_insecureProto.description: Label for specifying insecure protocol option.

options_overrideServiceURL.description: Custom URL to use that will override both stage and production URLs.

options_saving.description: Notifies the user that their changes to the options page are being saved

options_simulateCheckVersionFailure.description: Label for developer option to simulate checkVersion failure

options_simulateSimplifiedChinese.description: Label for developer option to simulate checkVersion failure

options_simulateSimplifiedChineseDescrip.description: Description for what it means to select this option
options_simulateSimplifiedChineseDescrip.message: Quando esta opção está activa, o Clipper agirá como se estivesse definido para o idioma Chinês Simplificado e com o objectivo de escolher um serviço para se ligar.

options_smartFilingBizDesc.description: Description of option to allow smart filing into business notebooks
options_smartFilingBizDesc.message: Permitir o Arquivo Inteligente em Bloco de Notas Business

options_smartFilingEnabled.description: Label for option to enable automatic tagging and notebook selection for new notes.

options_smartFilingEnabledDescription.description: Description of the smart filing option
options_smartFilingEnabledDescription.message: O Arquivo Inteligente selecciona automaticamente um bloco de notas e uma lista de etiquetas para si com base na qual está a fazer a captura.

options_storedCredentials.description: Label for a set of options controls enabling users to store their credentials

options_storedCredentialsDescription.description: Educational message for users who wish to store their Evernote password. First sentence is the most critical one as it will be used in options_storedCredentialsShortDescription
options_storedCredentialsDescription.message: ATENÇÃO: Ao armazenar as palavra-passe pode permitir que outros acedam à sua conta do Evernote quando estiverem a utilizar este browser. Remova ou termine sessão na extensão Capturar para o Evernote para remover permanentemente o nome de utilizador e a palavra-passe armazenados na extensão do seu browser.

options_useContextMenu.description: Label for option to enable clipping via contextual menu

options_useContextMenuDescription.description: Description of the contextual menu option
options_useContextMenuDescription.message: Quando esta opção estiver activa, pode capturar paginas web através do menu de contexto. Ao clicar com o botão direito em imagens, texto seleccionado ou qualquer outro sítio, irá revelar quais as opções de captura apropriadas.

options_useSearchHelperDescription.description: Description of the search-helper feature as shown on the options page
options_useSearchHelperDescription.message: Mostrar o conteúdo Evernote relacionado com as minhas pesquisas da web.

options_useStage.description: Label for developer option to simulate checkVersion failure

options_useStageDescription.description: Description for what it means to select this option
options_useStageDescription.message: Instrui o Clipper a utilizar a 'plataforma' de serviço em vez do serviço de produção, o que é normal apenas para testes.

organize.description: header for the filing info section of the sidebar

originalEmail.description: header in notes generated by the smart email extension that marks the start of the original email

panInstruction.description: Label for tip to hold control key to pan in skitch mode
panInstruction.message: Dica: Mantenha a tecla Ctrl pressionada enquanto clica para se deslocar

participants.description: label in gmail preview for the senders and recipients of a thread

pdf.description: label for shortcut to go to pdf mode

pdfTip.message: Sabia que pode capturar PDF's directamente para a sua conta Evernote utilizando o Web Clipper?

perfect.description: default label for the pink heart skitch stamp

pixelate.description: label for shortcut to use the pixelate tool in options page

popup_couldntStart.description: Message that shows up when the clipper popup can't open.
popup_couldntStart.message: Não foi possível iniciar o Clipper nesta página. Recarregue a página e tente novamente. Se isto não ajudar, entre em contacto com o suporte ao cliente.

popup_loadingNotebooks.description: Message shown while smart filing is running. Should *not* include trailing punctuation.

popup_loginCheckTimeout.description: Message that displays if checking if the user is logged in takes too long.
popup_loginCheckTimeout.message: A verificação de credenciais levou muito tempo. Certifique-se que está conectado à internet e tente novamente.

popup_moreNotesLink.description: Message showing how many more notes can be seen on the server.

popup_oneMoreNoteLink.description: Message showing there is one more note on the server.

popup_unsupportedScheme.description: The error to display when the popup can't operate on a specific type of url.
popup_unsupportedScheme.message: A captura a partir desta localização não é suportada.

popup_waiting.description: Displays while the popup window waits for a page to finish loading.

previewArticle.description: label for shortcut to go to article preview mode

previewFullPage.description: label for shortcut to go to full page preview mode

previewUrl.description: label for shortcut to go to url preview mode

proceed.description: button in SSO dialog that user uses to continue completing SSO

quickNoteAction_clipFullPage.description: Label for clipping full page action

quickNote_comment.description: Label for additional text to be added to the note

quickNote_notebook.description: Label for selection of note's notebook

quickNote_tagsDisabled.description: Message indicating that you can't use tags for shared notebooks.

rateNow.description: label for button in the ratings prompt to rate the web clipper in the chrome webstore

rateQuestion.description: question at the bottom of the feedback form that asks user to give a numerical rating for the clipper
rateQuestion.message: Como é que você classificaria esta versão do Web Clipper?

ratingPromptBody.message: O novo Web Clipper é projetado para o ajudar a capturar, armazenar, marcar e partilhar selectivamente qualquer coisa da web. Conte-nos o que você mais gosta.

ratingPromptHeader.message: Como é que você gosta do Web Clipper?

readingSpeed.description: label for clearly tts option in options page

rectangle.description: label for shortcut to use the rectangle tool in options page

redo.description: label for shortcut to redo skitch action in options page

referralTipBody.description: body of the promotion to refer friends to Evernote
referralTipBody.message: Quando os seus amigos começarem a utilizar o Evernote, nós iremos dar-lhe pontos para utilizar podendo-os trocar pelo Evernote Premium, uploads mensais maiores, e muito mais.

referralTipCTA.description: text for button at the bottom of the promotion to refer friends to Evernote

referralTipHeader.description: header of the promotion to refer friends to Evernote
referralTipHeader.message: Convide Amigos. Receba o Modo Premium

regAd.description: ad for evernote on the registration screen
regAd.message: Guarde as suas ideias, coisas que gosta, coisas que vê e ouve.

regForm_cancel.description: Allows user to back out of registration when s/he's creating an account during account switching

regForm_deactivated_username.description: User wanted to register with a deactivated username
regForm_deactivated_username.message: Nome de utilizador desactivado. Deseja reactivar a conta?

regForm_email_required.description: User didn't enter an email address
regForm_email_required.message: O endereço de e-mail é um campo obrigatório.

regForm_invalid_captcha.description: User didn't fill out the captcha.
regForm_invalid_captcha.message: Introduza os números que você vê na imagem.

regForm_invalid_email.description: User didn't enter a properly-formatted email address
regForm_invalid_email.message: O endereço de e-mail parece inválido.

regForm_invalid_password.message: Seleccione uma palavra-passe de 6 a 64 caracteres com letras, números e pontuação.

regForm_invalid_username.message: O seu nome de utilizador deve começar e terminar com uma letra ou número e pode conter hífenes e underscores.

regForm_password_required.message: A palavra-passe é um campo obrigatório.

regForm_taken_email.description: User entered a valid but unavailable email
regForm_taken_email.message: Este endereço de e-mail já está em uso.

regForm_taken_username.description: User entered a valid but unavailable username
regForm_taken_username.message: O nome de utilizador seleccionado já está em sendo utilizado por outro utilizador.

register.description: Text on the submit button of the registration form

registrationForm_username.description: Text on the username field of the registration form

registration_terms.description: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy agreement
registration_terms.message: Ao clicar em Registar, você aceita os Termos de Serviços and Política de Privacidade.

rejected.description: default label for the red X skitch stamp

relatedNotes.description: Label for the related notes button, and the title for the descriptive overlay.

relatedNotesDescription.description: message describing what Related Notes do.
relatedNotesDescription.message: O Evernote encontra até três notas na sua conta que estão relacionadas com a página que você acabou de capturar e apresenta-as aqui.

reminderAdded.description: message that reminder has been added to the note

reminderSaved.description: notification in smart email extension after note has been saved

reset.description: label for resetting zoom and pan in skitch mode

resetShortcuts.description: button to reset shortcuts in options page

roundedRectangle.description: label for shortcut to use the rounded rectangle tool in options page

safariContextClipImage.description: Label for right-click menu to clip an image in Safari.

safariContextClipPDF.description: Label for right-click menu to clip a PDF in Safari.

safariContextClipPage.description: Label for right-click menu to clip the whole page in Safari.

safariContextClipScreenshot.description: Label for right-click menu to clip a screenshot in Safari
safariContextClipScreenshot.message: Guardar captura de ecrã no Evernote

safariContextClipSelection.description: Label for right-click menu to clip a selection in Safari.

safariContextClipUrl.description: Label for right-click menu to clip a URL in Safari.

salesforceBodyA.description: body of the salesforce promotion, design A
salesforceBodyA.message: Ligue rapidamente as notas do Evernote com os registos da Salesforce, faça notas detalhadas sobre os clientes e ganhe novos conhecimentos acerca das pessoas com as quais se está a relacionar.

salesforceBodyB.description: body of the salesforce promotion, design B
salesforceBodyB.message: Partilhe notas com seus colegas, ganhe novos conhecimentos acerca das pessoas com as quais se está a relacionar e pode mesmo até vincular as suas notas directamente aos registos da Salesforce, se instalar a integração do Evernote Business para a Salesforce.

salesforceHeaderA.description: headline for salesforce promotion, design A
salesforceHeaderA.message: Faça mais com o Evernote Business para a Salesforce

salesforceHeaderB.description: headline for salesforce promotion, design B
salesforceHeaderB.message: Faça mais com o Evernote Business

save.description: button in smart email extension if user wants to save note to evernote

saveToEvernote.description: Label for button to save clip to Evernote

screenshotClip.description: label for option in global toolbar

screenshotCrosshairToast.message: Clique para capturar o ecrã inteiro ou arraste e solte para capturar apenas uma parte

screenshotToast.description: A toast to notify the user that skitch has completed taking a screenshot

searchHelperFoundNotes.description: Message indicating that related notes were found

searchHelperLoginMessage.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating that the user must login prior to seeing results.
searchHelperLoginMessage.message: Iniciar sessão no Web Clipper para exibir os Resultados Relacionados

searchHelperNoTransportError.description: Error message shown to user when there is a problem reaching the servers when doing simultaneous search.
searchHelperNoTransportError.message: A Pesquisa simultânea está neste momento indisponível porque não foi possível contactar os servidores do Evernote.

searchHelperNotesNotFoundBiz.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating there were no related notes found in personal or business accounts
searchHelperNotesNotFoundBiz.message: Nenhum Resultado Relacionado nas suas notas Pessoais ou de Negócios

searchHelperNotesNotFoundPers.description: Message injected into search-engine page indicating there were no related notes found in personal account
searchHelperNotesNotFoundPers.message: Nenhum Resultado Relacionado nas suas notas

searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatches.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in the user's business account
searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatches.message: $num$ Resultados Relacionados nas suas Notas Business

searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatchesOne.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in the user's business account, if there was only one result
searchHelperTopBizLibraryMatchesOne.message: 1 Resultado Relacionado nas suas notas Business

searchHelperTopMatchesBiz.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in a business user's personal account
searchHelperTopMatchesBiz.message: $num$ Resultados Relacionados nas suas Notas pessoais

searchHelperTopMatchesBizOne.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in a business user's personal account, if there was only one result
searchHelperTopMatchesBizOne.message: 1 Resultado Relacionado nas suas notas pessoais

searchHelperTopMatchesPers.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in a non-business user's personal account

searchHelperTopMatchesPersOne.description: Section heading for the simsearch notes found in a non-business user's personal account, if there was only one result

searchHelper_hidePerm.description: Text for the option in the simsearch drop down menu to let user to disable simsearch in the options

searchHelper_hideTemp.description: Text for the option in the simsearch drop down menu to let user temporarily close the simsearch box, but not disable in the options

seeMore.description: link on expertise search results to open person's People Detail view in the desktop client

selectAllMarkup.description: label for shortcut to select all markup objects in options page

selectAllMessages.description: label in gmail preview for the checkbox to select all messages in a thread

selectNotebook.description: label in options page to describe the keyboard shortcut that opens the filing dialog with a focus on the notebook field

selectionMode.description: label for shortcut to go to text selection mode

send.description: label for submit button on the feedback form

sendFeedback.description: label for button in the ratings prompt to send feedback to our customer support team

sendReport.description: button to submit crash report when the user fails to clip a page

sendTo.description: label for recipients textbox of the email sharing dialog

setShortcutInstruction.description: tooltip for setting a keyboard shortcut in the options page
setShortcutInstruction.message: Para alterar - atacar agora a combinação de teclas no seu teclado

share.description: button to send note in email sharing dialog

sharedNotebook.description: tooltip for shared notebooks in notebook selector

shortcutConflict.description: error message when user tries to use a key combo for a shortcut that has already been used

shortcutLengthError.description: error message when user tries to set a shortcut that's more than three keys long
shortcutLengthError.message: Os atalhos devem ter 3 ou menos teclas em combinação

shortcutNoEsc.description: error message when user tries to use ESC for any shortcut other than the one to close the clipper
shortcutNoEsc.message: Não é possível utilizar o ESC neste atalho

shortcutReleaseNotesBody.description: body for the release notes that notifies the user that shortcuts are configurable
shortcutReleaseNotesBody.message: Visite a página das opções para aprender e definir os seus atalhos favoritos. Defina o atalho mais importante agora!

shortcutReleaseNotesHeader.description: header for the release notes that notifies the user that shortcuts are configurable

shortcutReleaseNotesTooltip.message: Coloque o cursor no campo e coloque o atalho que você deseje ter

shortcuts_email.description: label for shortcut to go to email mode

showMeMore.description: button on promotions that links to a web page on the Evernote marketing site that has more info about the product that is in the promotion

showRelatedNotes.description: text for the link in the 'related notes' overlay that will show this section.

showSuccessfulClipDialog.description: option in options page. if enabled, it shows the full post clip dialog after a successful clip
showSuccessfulClipDialog.message: Mostrar diálogo de captura com sucesso

showSuccessfulClipDialogWithoutRelatedNo.description: option in options page. if enabled, it shows the post clip dialog w/o related notes after a successful clip
showSuccessfulClipDialogWithoutRelatedNo.message: Mostrar diálogo de captura com sucesso sem as respectivas Notas Relacionadas

signInPrompt.description: hover text on signed out state of the toolbar icon

signInToBusiness.description: link in sidebar for user to complete SSO

signOutAccount.description: menu item for logging out of the currently selected account.

signedInAs.description: label for username in options page

signout.description: Text on a link prompting for signing out currently logged in user

sixDigitCode.description: placeholder text in the textbox for the two step verification/backup code

skitchTip.message: Desenhe formas, setas e esboços rápidos para mostrar o seu ponto de vista com o Skitch.

smsMessage.description: Message shown on the SMS Two Step page
smsMessage.message: Enviámos uma mensagem de texto com um código de verificação para $phone$.

ssoDialog1Part1.description: first part of the SSO dialog
ssoDialog1Part1.message: Você necessita de completar alguns passos adicionais para poder aceder ao conteúdo da sua conta Business

ssoDialog1Part2.description: second part of the SSO dialog
ssoDialog1Part2.message: Se clicar em Ignorar, você não será capaz de aceder ao conteúdo da conta Business até que você conclua esses passos. Enquanto isso não acontece, você poderá continuar a trabalhar com o seu conteúdo Pessoal.

ssoDialog2.description: body of the second SSO dialog
ssoDialog2.message: Ser-lhe-á solicitada numa janela separada a autenticação da sua conta Business. Por favor, clique em 'Tentar Novamente' se essa janela não aparecer.

stack.description: tooltip for stack icon in filing dialog

stamp.description: label for shortcut to use the stamp tool in options page

startWebClipper.description: label for shortcut to start web clipper

startWebClipperClearly.description: label for shortcut to start clipper in clearly mode
startWebClipperClearly.message: Iniciar o Web Clipper no Modo Simplificado

subjectRequired.description: placeholder text for the subject field in the feedback form

systemInfo.description: header for the system info section of the feedback form. contains info about operating system, clipper version, language

tagNamesNotInRange.description: Indicates that user entered an abnormal number of tags

tagSelection.description: label for tag selection in options page

takeScreenshot.description: label for shortcut to go to skitch mode

text.description: label for shortcut to use the text tool in options page

tomorrow.description: button to set reminder for tomorrow

tryItOut.description: text for button on pdf tooltip

twoStepHelp.message: Preciso de ajuda para obter um código de verificação

undo.description: label for shortcut to undo skitch action in options page

update.description: label for update button in sidebar

upgradeToPremium.description: Message in the user menu telling free users to upgrade to premium

urlCopied.description: shared url copied to clipboard confirmation
urlCopied.message: URL copiado para área de transferência

useSmartFiling.description: label for using smart filing in notebook/tag selection on options page

version.description: string for version info in the options page

viewCrashReport.description: link to view crash report when the user fails to clip a page

viewInEvernote.description: link to smart email note after note has been saved

viewInGmail.description: button in notes generated by the smart email extension that links back to the original gmail thread

voice.description: label for clearly's tts voice in options page

webClipperUpdated.description: hover text on the Updated state of the toolbar icon
webClipperUpdated.message: Veja o que há de novo no Web Clipper

what.description: default label for the blue question skitch stamp

wow.description: default label for the orange exclamation skitch stamp

youHaveRelatedNotes.description: Text indicating that the user has other related notes.
youHaveRelatedNotes.message: Você possui outras notas iguais a esta.

zoomInShortcut.description: label for shortcut to zoom in on skitch in options page

zoomOutShortcut.description: label for shortcut to zoom out on skitch in options page

zoomToFit.description: label for shortcut to make skitch image stretch the image to fit in the window in options page

zoomToOriginal.description: label for shortcut to make skitch image go to 100% zoom level in options page

zoomin.description: tooltip for skitch zoom in tool

zoomout.description: tooltip for skitch zoom out tool
